org.apache.ignite.ml.trees.trainers.columnbased.regcalcs

Class RegionCalculators

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.trees.trainers.columnbased.regcalcs.RegionCalculators

  • public class RegionCalculators
extends Object
    Some commonly used functions for calculations of regions of space which correspond to decision tree leaf nodes.
